certificates.title: Basic Web Development Using WordPress
certificates.description: The webinar discussed setting up and configuring WordPress, customizing themes and layouts, installing and managing plugins, creating and organizing pages and posts, and applying basic SEO techniques. It also covered best practices for website design, responsiveness, and content management to build professional and user-friendly websites.

certificates.title: Intermediate Level of Software Engineering
certificates.description: This webinar explored key software engineering concepts such as system design, software development life cycle (SDLC), object-oriented programming principles, and project management practices. It focused on improving coding efficiency, teamwork, and problem-solving skills for building scalable and maintainable software applications.

certificates.title: JavaScript Algorithms
certificates.description: JavaScript algorithms and data structures certification
